thread.title: Angela Hewitt
thread.title_full: Lifestyle Furniture reviewed by Angela Hewitt

author: Angela Hewitt
title: Angela Hewitt
text:
our experience with Lifestyle furniture has been fantastic, we are extremely happy with the furniture it'self and the great service we have received from beginning to end. I do not hesitate to encourage others to buy and will be looking on the site for other items to compliment the purchases we have made.
A and P - Salisbury
